level.heading: Rules and regulations for tax deferral provisions.
level.text: The Mayor may promulgate rules and regulations for the proper administration of the provisions of §§ 47-845 and 47-846.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-119, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-824.

level.heading: References in Text
level.text: Section 47-846 was repealed by § 3 of D.C. Law 4-128.
